abstract: Continuum Health Partners and NYU Langone Medical Center, two of New York City's major hospital organizations, are exploring a partnership that would give them a large share of the city's patients and make them a formidable rival for other city hospitals in tough economic times.
snippet: A proposed alliance between Continuum Health Partners and NYU Langone Medical Center reflects a wider trend toward bigger medical organizations.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York University Langone Medical Center

lead_paragraph: A proposed alliance between Continuum Health Partners and NYU Langone Medical Center reflects a wider trend toward bigger medical organizations.

headline.main: Two Major Hospital Groups in City Explore a Partnership
headline.print_headline: Two Major Hospital Groups In City Explore a Partnership
